body.p:
Canton Jan'y 26th 1861
Col. J. L. Irwin
Frankfort
Dr Sir

Herewith I send a petition to the Govenor requesting him to remit a forfeiture against Mr. Diliam Futrell. I will be glad (if you have time) if you will present it to the Govenor and urge him to remit it, Mr Linn is a acquainted with Mr Futrill and all the circumstances attending, and will no doubt join in asking a remittance of the judgment.

If you can get the matter remitted please direct that the order be directed to me at this office. If the petition is insufficient in any way and can be remedied I shall be glad to have your suggestion as to what may be lacking.
